summary: Germany in the early 19th century. "Die Vermessung der Welt" follows the two brilliant and eccentric scientists Alexander von Humboldt and Carl Friedrich Gauss on their life paths.
cast: Albrecht Schuch|Baldanpurev Sambuu|Agi Ariunsaichan Dawaachu|Karl Markovics|Lennart Hänsel|Mercedes Jadea Diaz|Pascal Fiedler|Moritz Adler|Aaron Denkel|Sunnyi Melles|Nils Dreschke|Paul Lux|Michael Maertens|Billi Baumgärtner|Max Giermann|Katharina Thalbach|Guntbert Warns|Florian David Fitz|Sebastian Brandes|Jérémy Kapone|Antonio Ordoñez|Noberto Novik|Anastasiia Kirilik|Davo Enomenga|Vanessa Rodas|José Alvear|Juana Guarderas|Cristina Coral|Georg Friedrich|Marco de la Torre|Victor Pape-Thies|Christian Cobo|Jose Levith|Vicky Krieps|Alex Brendemühl|Thomas Loibl|Tatiana Merizalde Dobles|Anna Unterberger|Ronald Kukulies|Guido Navarro|Heiko Klimenko-hamann|Eric Minsk|Peter Matic|Anne Berlin|Ursula Heyne|Rafael Santi|Lennie Gottberg|Leo Hermann|Thomas Oláh|Nino Nervi|Amelie Klein|David Kross|Leopold Nicolaus|Oliver Belling|Michael Schenk|Tobias Margiol|Sven Regener|Leander Haußmann|Daniel Kehlmann|Johannes Zeiler|Detlev Buck|Wolfram Gumz|Bernadette Knoller|Robert Holik|Philipp Rusch
title: Midiendo el mundo
